Undertale is a property of Toby Fox. All rights to Undertale belong to Toby Fox.

 This app is made without any profit intent, and WE DO NOT SUPPORT PIRACY.

 This app does not distribute the Undertale game; it only runs Undertale files optimized for Android.

 If you need more information, please send an email to: pultecsoftware@gmail.com.

 If you are Toby Fox, please contact us for more information and to discuss future ports.

 original port by jockeholm mobile controls by Angelapuzzle reworked by booker/Y2K.

 app icon by MrOwO07.

 By pressing Accept, you agree to all the above.

 Sincerely,
Booker

This application allows users to patch and run "Undertale" from Steam on their Android device.
 To use it, a copy of the original game must be installed on the phone.
 The application was developed to facilitate the portability of "Undertale", maintaining an authentic experience adapted for mobile devices.
 We hope you enjoy playing the game on your phone!
 Credits: - Undertale By Toby Fox - UndertaleModTool by Grossley
 - Base Controls by Jockeholm and AngelaPuzzle and Matiw (in their revamped controls project)
 - GameMaker Studio by YoYo Games (development engine)
 - Android Studio by Google (Android app development platform)
 - Booker (Undertale QuickRun Android)
 This project was carried out with dedication to offer a mobile experience close to the original.
What do you want to do?
Load game (Only the data.win patched by the app can be loaded. To use mods, modify the app-patched data.win)
Select the game language to patch
